metadata.title: CVE-2024-26922 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/amdgpu: validate the parameters of bo mapping operations more clearlyVerify the parameters ofamdgpu_vm_bo_(map/replace_map/clearing_mappings) in one common place.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
